reviews.customers_say: Customers love the sweater's soft stretchy material and find it comfortable, particularly for cold winters, with one noting it maintains its shape after washing.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable! Both are important
items.body: I recently purchased the ANRABESS Women's Turtleneck Oversized Sweater, and I couldn't be happier with my choice! This stylish and cozy knit pullover has quickly become a staple in my winter wardrobe. One of the standout features of this sweater is its oversized design, which not only adds a touch of contemporary flair but also provides the ultimate comfort. The long batwing sleeves give it a relaxed and laid-back vibe, making it perfect for both casual outings and cozy nights in. I particularly appreciate the unique touch of the asymmetric hem, adding a subtle element of style that sets it apart from other turtleneck sweaters. The attention to detail in the design is impressive and adds a trendy edge to the overall look. As someone with a longer torso, I often struggle to find sweaters that offer sufficient coverage without being too short. The ANRABESS sweater, however, is a game-changer in this regard. Its length is just right, providing the coverage I need without sacrificing style. It's a relief to find a sweater that caters to those with longer torsos without compromising on fashion. The turtleneck is both cozy and functional, keeping me warm on chilly days without feeling too constricting. The knit fabric is of high quality, ensuring durability and a luxurious feel against the skin. In conclusion, the ANRABESS Women's Turtleneck Oversized Sweater is a must-have for anyone seeking a fashionable and comfortable addition to their winter wardrobe. Its thoughtful design, including the perfect length for those with longer torsos, makes it a standout choice. I've received numerous compliments whenever I wear it, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a versatile and stylish knit pullover. Read more
items.author: L. West

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars For Your Comfy, Cozy Winter Vibe
items.body: It's soft, it's cozy, it's oversized (depending on how you feel about that, maybe order a size down). The assymetric hem and the batwing sleeves are what separates this from every - other - oversized - sweater. It hits about the waist in the front and below the butt in the back. The description may call the sleeves "batwing" but, they're really not. The neck is a really pretty rib that is also flattering and not constricting. I mean, realistically, how many off-white oversized sweaters does one need? (Mine is pale apricot, which is just another way of saying, tell me you have an off-white sweater, without telling me that you have an off-white sweater.) You need this one. And, it goes with everything, from leggings to dress pants to skirts (maxi and mini). It can do casual, it can do dressy. It also comes in a ton of colors. (31, I think.) It's $43, and, honestly, I had to think about it before I put it in my cart. For me, that's a little pricey for a sweater. But, I'm glad I purchased it and would certainly purchase another one, after I wore the heck out of this one. A warning from someone who is not big on personal contact: People will find reasons to touch this and, by extension, you. It is that soft and cozy. Read more
items.author: Nan Reed

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Oversized trendy
items.body: Ladies, do you like an oversized, relaxed fit? If so, buy this sweater and wear it boldly with a dash of poise. The sweater has a slouchy style, with the back hem longer than the front. It is batwing as advertised, and though the sleeves are longer than expected, they add to the overall carefree look. It's a weekend sweater paired with your boyfriend jeans or sweats. Brew a good strong cup, find a porch to hang out on, and cozy up under a layer of warmth and chic. For reference: I am 5'2", 108lb, and I purchased the Small in Navy. The navy is slightly darker than in the picture, and the small was definitely oversized - the front reaches mid-thigh, and the back covers my bum, so it would look great with leggings. I put it in a cool wash, light quick cycle, and dried it flat. It didn't shrink, but it did pill slightly. I highly recommend this sweater. Read more
items.author: Lois J

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous sweater
items.body: I love this sweater! It fits so well and has a nice soft feel to it. The sizing is right on. The color is a deep and rich. A nice weight for the season and keeps you warm. Read more
items.author: RAH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I want to wear this all the time!
items.body: I have purchased this sweater several times and have also recommended these for friends. I They are so nice and cozy and warm for the colder months - and come in a multitude of great colors. It runs roomy. I am just shy of 5’2” and weigh 123 pounds and I wear a small, and it’s perfect for me (I like things loose). I would wear mine every day if I could! Read more
items.author: LL

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A new favorite sweater
items.body: Love the sweater! So thrilled that it fits well..XL is roomy not huge and the knit is very soft. Mine is a turtleneck and sits right where it should, not tightly which I am pleased about. I did not detect any odor right out of the bag. As noted by another reviewer, the sweater came in a clear plastic bag with the contents visible. Despite that I will order again. I purchased black as a trial and want the navy blue as well. Recommend. Read more
items.author: Katinka

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Apricot, Orange Rust, Black, Camel, Gray Coffee, Lavender, Celadon, Grey, Pink White, Deep Apricot, Navy Blue, Mutmeg, Dark Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
